__e: OK so I'm never going to make it to the Cordon Bleu, but I thought it would be less of a disaster than helping out on the farm.
Can't pay in money, but I've got a bed in the attic and my Elizabeth makes a fine meal.
And there is no way you'd eat anything that hasn't been prepared at Cordon Bleu.
Wow, it must be really well cordoned off over there.
Do you think you could get the police to let me across the barricade, let me up there?
I do not care if you have to red file him To get past the marine guard.
